entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being addressed by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is happy to see Harry caught.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who is being sent by Professor Umbridge to round up more students.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Another name for Harry, used by Professor Umbridge when addressing him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is being worried about by Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is being worried about by Harry because she might be expelled before taking her O.W.L.s.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, whose first meeting was disrupted by the situation.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who is getting good at something but it's not specified what.

entities.name: parkinson
entities.description: A teacher or staff member at Hogwarts, who is tasked with checking the girls' bathrooms.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge assigns Malfoy a task to round up more students.
Professor Umbridge asks Harry (Potter) to come with her to the headmaster's office.
